main event: A brilliant white light was observed plunging into a large gaseous blue and green cloud in the northwest sky from Van Nuys, California.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on September 21, 1957, at around 7:50 PM., The phenomenon was initially reported as an unusual sight emerging from a green cloud., The Air Force suggested the sighting was likely due to a missile launched from Vandenberg Air Force Base., Sgt. Hayden reported that the sight might have been caused by a mirage resulting from the missile's vapor trail., No physical evidence was found to confirm the sighting.
witness description: A person who reported observing an unusual light in the sky.
